mapper.insert: insert into ecs_sessions (sesskey, expiry, userid, adminid, ip, user_name, user_rank, discount, email, data) values (#{sesskey,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{expiry,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{adminid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ip,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userRank,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{discount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{data,jdbcType=CHAR})
mapper.update: update ecs_sessions set expiry = #{expiry,jdbcType=INTEGER}, userid = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, adminid = #{adminid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ip = #{ip,jdbcType=CHAR}, user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_rank = #{userRank,jdbcType=TINYINT}, discount = #{discount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, data = #{data,jdbcType=CHAR} where sesskey = #{sesskey,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: select sesskey, expiry, userid, adminid, ip, user_name, user_rank, discount, email, data from ecs_sessions where sesskey = #{sesskey,jdbcType=CHAR}
select sesskey, expiry, userid, adminid, ip, user_name, user_rank, discount, email, data from ecs_sessions
